recipeNotes: You can skip the toasting and instead you can fry these for just 2 secs in hot oil.
postTags: easy and quick snacks recipes indian
quick snacks to make at home
title: Canapes Recipe - Indian Chat Stuffing

steps.text: In a baking tray, place the canapes and bake these in a preheated oven at 200 C for 2-3 mins in Toast Mode.
Take a mixing bowl, add in the onions, cucumber, tomato, lemon juice, coriander, salt, black salt, red chili powder, cumin powder, chat masala. Mix well.
Take the canapes out, spread a thin layer of ketchup and add in the stuffing, top it off with some sev and serve immediately.

content:
Hie Friends,

Today, I've got canapes with chatpati chaat stuffing.. This is so easy to make that you can rock and roll in less than 5 mins, and and thats not all, this is toasted and not baked which means even healthier!!


I can guarantee that one will ask for more and more.. So lets have a look at the recipe!




Be creative and make numerous stuffing and enjoy! I love this chatpati stuffing which is just very fast



 

Until Next time, Take Care.

Thanks

Have a great time!
